hotels.title: San Francisco Family-Friendly Retreat in the Heart of Fisherman's Wharf with Daily Resort Credit
hotels.description: Discover the vibrant energy of San Francisco from this playful base in the heart of Fisherman's Wharf. Just steps from the city's celebrated waterfront, this contemporary retreat offers effortless access to iconic attractions, including Pier 39's playful sea lions, immersive exhibits at The Exploratorium and colourful marine life at Aquarium of the Bay. After exploring famous cable car routes and soaking up Golden Gate views, return to the hotel’s heated outdoor pool or enjoy a relaxed drink at CAZBAR. Let the little ones unwind in the Game Zone, featuring arcade games, foosball tables and board games, before meeting back up for the hotel's nightly milk and cookie hour.

hotels.title: San Francisco Creative Boutique Hotel by Union Square with Designer Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Dive into the heart of San Francisco with a stay at the creative Hotel Zetta. This boutique gem, nestled in the vibrant SoMa district, is an ideal base for accessing the city's iconic landmarks, from Union Square's shopping mecca to the bustling foodie paradise of the Ferry Building Marketplace. After a day of urban exploration, retreat to the hotel's plush interiors and grab a bite at The Cavalier brasserie, designed by award-winning San Francisco designer Ken Fulk, or cocktails at glitzy Marianne's.

hotels.title: Eclectic Art-Inspired San Francisco Escape near Vibrant Union Square
hotels.description: Awaken your creative soul at a luxurious San Francisco launchpad that defies the norm: Hotel Emblem San Francisco - an audaciously expressive hotel inspired by some of the world’s greatest writers, artists, poets and rabble-rousers. Every corner is designed to spark the imagination, from bottled cocktails delivered to your door to the book-filled Writer’s Alcove in the lobby and the quirky guestrooms, where colours and patterns play. Standing loud and proud on the intersection of iconic neighbourhoods Nob Hill, Union Square and the glitzy Theater District, this eclectic haven offers easy access to San Fran's most storied landmarks and locations. Follow a self-guided tour from the hotel's Underground Concierge to find under-the-radar local sights that will ignite your curiosity. Take that iconic snap as you gaze upon the glorious Golden Gate Bridge, treat your tastebuds to some freshly caught crab at Fisherman's Wharf or roll through the tree-lined streets on a classic cable car and trolley hop through the city. After days filled with exploring, hang out at the hotel and spark conversation over handcrafted cocktails in the sleek Obscenity Bar & Lounge, hire a selection of unorthodox amenities - from tarot cards to record players, colouring books to meditation bowls - or sit back and record your experiences on the lobby typewriter.

hotels.title: Boutique San Francisco Luxe Escape near Union Square
hotels.description: Find yourself on the doorstep of one of San Francisco's most vibrant scenes with a boutique stay at The Marker Hotel near Union Square. Flaunting San Francisco flair through its collection of stylish rooms and suites, to its bar-driven Italian eatery, Tratto, dishing up rustic Italian cuisine, this contemporary city stay stamps a modern mark on a historic neighbourhood. Surrounded by an exciting array of shops, restaurants and entertainment, you'll be perfectly placed for exploring; hop on a trademark cable car and trundle your way around the city or take an unmissable tour to Alcatraz.

hotels.vendor_name: Staypineapple, An Elegant Hotel, Union Square San Francisco
hotels.title: Top-Rated San Francisco Escape in the Heart of Downtown near Union Square
hotels.description: Soak up the sights of cosmopolitan San Francisco at Staypineapple, An Elegant Hotel. Promising an out-of-the-ordinary stay, this stylish launchpad nestled near Union Square offers a luxe experience that is totally unique. From the moment you step through the door, you’ll be charmed by its classy décor, curated art collection, friendly staff willing to go the extra mile and the brand's cheeky signature yellow touches; from pineapple-shaped welcome cookies to emblazoned phone chargers and embroidered pillows. Visit Pineapple Bistro & Bar and order yourself a signature cocktail before hitting the town, then borrow a beach cruiser bicycle and cycle around or simply spend your time exploring one of the world’s most amazing cities on foot. Housed in a historic building, smack-bang in the thick of it, the hotel affords easy access to a plethora of attractions, boutiques, cafés, theatres and parks. You'll be steps from the instantly recognisable cable cars and in close proximity to Market Street, the Golden Gate Bridge, and the iconic districts of Chinatown, Telegraph Hill, Embarcadero and SoMa. This chic hotel received a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 award, placing it among the top 10% of properties worldwide on the review site.

hotels.title: Historic Downtown San Francisco Escape with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Experience timeless elegance at this grand retreat located in the heart of the downtown San Francisco. Venture to the nearby Embarcadero for stunning views of the Bay Bridge, explore the vibrant Chinatown or indulge in the city's renowned culinary scene. After a day of exploration, retreat back to the hotel and pay a visit to, Monte's Restaurant & Bar, for a cocktail mixed to perfection and a carefully crafted meal by the in-house master chefs. This hotel offers the perfect blend of historic charm and modern luxury, with a state-of-the-art fitness centre and guest rooms that exude elegance, comfort & sophistication.

hotels.title: Minimalist Boutique-Style Escape in San Francisco
hotels.description: Experience the energetic, sophisticated and world-class beauty of San Francisco with a stay at the boutique Kimpton Enso Hotel, an IHG Hotel. Hop on board one of the iconic cable carts that journey up and down the steep hills of the city, stopping at the historic museums or pumping restaurants serving the city’s famous clam chowder, before discovering the upscale luxury of this minimalistic, Japanese-inspired hotel in the heart of the Japantown neighbourhood.

hotels.title: San Francisco Boutique Stay on Buzzing Market Street with Award-Winning Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Unwind in urban style at Hotel Zelos in San Francisco's sought-after SoMa district. Located within the historic Pacific Building, it's where storied opulence and modern luxury meet. Enjoy vibrant shopping, dining and entertainment on your doorstep, and intimate cocktails and award-winning fare at the hotel's bar and restaurant, Dirty Habit. Rent a bike from the lobby and explore San Fran as the locals do, or simply exercise in the comfort of the onsite fitness centre.

hotels.title: San Francisco Heritage Nob Hill Stay with Top Floor Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Experience the best of the Bay Area with a stay at the historic InterContinental Mark Hopkins San Francisco, an IHG Hotel. Enjoy true sophistication at the crest of the upscale Nob Hill neighbourhood, where you can take in sweeping views of the Golden Gate Bridge from the Top of the Mark restaurant and bar on the 19th floor. With an elegant entrance hall, attentive staff and a tastefully decorated room, the charms of San Francisco start at check-in.

hotels.title: San Francisco Bay Waterfront Escape overlooking Bay Bridge with Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Soak up the electric atmosphere of San Francisco with a stay directly on the Embarcadero waterfront. Seamlessly blending modern comfort and sophisticated design, this contemporary haven is the perfect base to explore the lively neighbourhood and nearby attractions, including Fisherman's Wharf, Alcatraz Island and the iconic Golden Gate Bridge. Back at the hotel, treat yourself to innovative, contemporary Japanese cuisine or sample one of North America’s largest sake lists at Ozumo.

hotels.title: San Francisco Rockstar Retreat with Burger Restaurant, Coffee Shop & Fitness Centre
hotels.description: Groove to the off-kilter melody and bohemian charm of the Golden City with a rockstar-worthy stay at the iconic Hotel Zeppelin San Francisco. Nestled in the heart of the city, this edgy retreat is a stone's throw from vibrant Union Square, the historic Haight-Ashbury district, and the delicious eats of Chinatown. After a day of exploration, retreat to this haven where vintage meets modern in a symphony of style inspired by some of music’s most iconic movers and shakers. Indulge in a tasty feed at PLS on Post, the onsite spot for burgers, shakes and beer, or enjoy a light bite and quick espresso at the funky Zeppelin Café.

hotels.title: Upscale San Francisco Escape Overlooking Fisherman's Wharf with Standout Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Discover San Francisco at the upscale Kimpton Alton Hotel-Fisherman's Wharf, an IHG Hotel, an elevated retreat overlooking both the shimmering bay and twinkling city lights. Explore the iconic landmarks before returning to enjoy a cocktail at Abaca Bar and restaurant, run by Chef Francis Ang, whose specialty contemporary Filipino-Californian fusion cuisine earned the restaurant a place on the New York Times' Best Restaurants List 2022.

hotels.title: Historic San Francisco Downtown Escape near Union Square
hotels.description: Treat yourself to an indulgent stay at The Clift Royal Sonesta Hotel, an urban sanctuary positioned in the heart of Downtown San Francisco. This stylish property is the perfect base for exploring the city and boasts the very best of San Francisco on your doorstep - including Union Square with close reach or the famed Alcatraz Island just a short distance away. This historic architectural marvel is anything but ordinary, and the interior showcases the very best of modern-day San Francisco sophistication and quintessential Art Deco flair that perfectly reflects the hotel's storied past, which dates back to 1915. Raise a glass in the rich, redwood-panelled Redwood Room, indulge in a menu inspired by San Francisco’s historic past and its open-hearted culture at Fredericks, enjoy access to the Peloton Bike in the fitness centre, or simply unwind in the hotel's thoughtfully appointed guest rooms.
